alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 22 at 3:02AM EST until December 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Delaware...southern New Jersey...and southeast Pennsylvania...including the following areas...in northern Delaware...New Castle. In southern New Jersey...Camden, Gloucester, Northwestern Burlington, and Salem. In southeast Pennsylvania...Delaware, Eastern Chester, Eastern Montgomery, Lower Bucks, and Philadelphia. * WHEN...From 1 PM EST this afternoon through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks
